content:
Link two ideas from the passage.
The Coronavirus pandemic has had a huge impact on the world. Countries have responded with aid programs, educational assistance, and stimulus plans.

The two ideas from the passage that can be linked are the "Coronavirus pandemic" and "countries responding with aid programs, educational assistance, and stimulus plans." The link between these ideas is that the widespread impact of the pandemic necessitated a response from countries in the form of various support measures to mitigate the economic and social disruptions caused by the virus.
